name: Chital Bowl XL
description: The Chital Bowl with it's amorphous shape is both beautiful and functional. This new XL size is a great vide-poche or tray. Available in 4 other sizes. Handmade; Shagreen & Bronze-Patina Brass; Wipe clean with soft dry cloth; Made in Philippines. Although inspired by her parents, Kifu's collection of Home Accessories and Furniture is a distinct identity of its own. Shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight, color variants may occur, showcasing the Parisian label's commitment to authenticity and luxury using natural components.
